alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Coastal Volusia; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued December 22 at 3:09PM EST until December 23 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Significant coastal flooding expected due to tidal effects. * WHERE...Coastal Volusia, Coastal Indian River, Coastal Saint Lucie, Coastal Martin, Northern Brevard Barrier Islands and Southern Brevard Barrier Islands Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Coastal roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Shoreline erosion may also occur, especially along portions of the coastline left vulnerable by recent erosion. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Coastal flooding is expected to occur with the morning high tide cycle Friday morning and again Saturday and Sunday mornings. As a result, an extension or additional issuance of the Coastal Flood Warning may be needed beyond Friday morning.
info.instruction: Coastal flooding is expected Friday morning. Coastal residents in the warned area should be alert for rising water, and take appropriate action to protect life and flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Coastal Volusia; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
